abilities.description: When you make a move to disrtupt or hack a specific foe, threat or secure system, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.a2d7793b23c17489]{Secure an Advantage} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.13b2d777c6fb719d]{Gather Information} by scanning your surroundings or analyzing a nearby object, choose one (before rolling) and take +1 momentum on a hit.

  • Manual scan: Add +1.
  • Automated scan: Preset your action die to the Medusa's integrity.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.2f2ba4090b22a122]{Enter the Fray} against an ambush, or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger} to detect a hidden threat, you may roll +integrity. If you do, reroll any dice and take +1 momentum on a hit.
